casebody.data:
M.L., a Minor, By His Parents and Next Friends, Akiva and Shani Leiman, et al., petitioners,
v.
Jack R. SMITH, in His Official Capacity as Superintendent, et al. No. 17-852. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 16, 2018.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.
